import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Product, products } from '../../product'; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; @Component({ selector: 'app-product-list', templateUrl: './product-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./product-list.component.scss'], }) export class ProductListComponent { products: Product[] = products; }
